info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 2:02AM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...Thunderstorms will impact portions of Schenectady, south central Warren, Fulton, Saratoga, northern Schoharie, southern Washington, southern Herkimer, Montgomery and northwestern Rensselaer Counties through 245 AM EDT... At 201 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from near Corinth to near Hagaman to near Leonardsville. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 30 mph possible. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Schenectady, Clifton Park, Rotterdam, Saratoga Springs, Amsterdam, Gloversville, Glens Falls, Johnstown, Ilion, Herkimer, Scotia, Mechanicville, Little Falls, Cobleskill, Canajoharie, Salem, Fonda, Glenville, Niskayuna and Duanesburg. This includes the following highways... Interstate 88 between exits 20 and 25. Interstate 90 between exits 25a and 30. Interstate 890 between exits 1a and 8. Interstate 87 between exits 8A and 18. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
